name: Chicken, Spinach, and Cheese Pasta Bake
author: jr911
summary: Pasta, chicken, spinach, and cheese baked to bubbly perfection.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Saute onion in hot oil until tender, 5 to 7 minutes
Mix penne pasta, onion, chicken, diced tomatoes, spinach, and cream cheese together in a baking dish until the cream cheese melts and coats everything
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the pasta mixture
Cover baking dish with aluminum foil
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes
Remove foil and continue baking until heated through and beginning to brown along the edges, about 15 minutes more
